title: Hostel Management Web Portal
description: Developed a Hostel Management Web-Solution from scratch, implementing JWT authentication for 2600+ users. Ensured seamless user experience and efficient project collaboration through Git version control.

title: Invictus Website
description: A website for Invictus(The Annual Techfest of College), built for showcasing our fest, events, to increase reach to the audience and for user registrations.

title: MannNirvana
description: Developed an AI-driven mental well-being platform featuring an intelligent virtual therapist for emotional support. Integrated NLP techniques to enable sentiment analysis and implemented robust content moderation to ensure a safe user environment.

title: CityPulse
description: An initiative towards building safer & smarter cities, being eco-friendly and proper utilization of resources.

title: Intellhire
description: Developed a platform that helps freshers tailor their resumes, prepare for job applications, and receive job-related posts from Hive Blogs.
